article_title: DOUG LOON: Use budget surplus to improve our competitiveness
article_text:
Owatonna, MN (55060)

Today

Rain this morning with thunderstorms by evening. High 76F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%..

Tonight

Cloudy skies this evening followed by thunderstorms late. A few storms may be severe. Low near 60F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Jackson

og.description: The recent forecast of a $1.87 billion budget surplus is a perfect backdrop to our season of holiday cheer. State coffers continue to grow on the strength of the hard
